ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.CONTENT:
Hello! I'm a frontend developer passionate about creating sleek, high-performance, and user-friendly interfaces. With over 3 years of experience, I specialize in end-to-end development, from design and prototyping interfaces to building scalable applications. My focus is on delivering flawless user experiences with a strong emphasis on performance, accessibility, and maintainability.

I've worked on various projects, including e-commerce platforms, corporate blogs, internal systems, and mobile apps. I also create custom design systems and reusable component libraries to enhance scalability and consistency.

My tech stack includes React, Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, React Native, WordPress, Strapi, and SEO optimization. Currently based in Brussels, Belgium, I'm always seeking opportunities to create high-quality digital experiences that meet business needs and industry best practices.

If you're looking for a developer who blends creativity, technical expertise, and problem-solving skills, let's connect!

SOFTWARE_DEVELOPMENT.TITLE: Software Development
SOFTWARE_DEVELOPMENT.CONTENT: I'm not just writing code; I'm architecting fast and scalable applications. With React, Next.js, and React Native in my toolkit, I deliver resilient solutions that stand the test of time. Performance and scalability are always top of mind, ensuring that every project I build can grow easily. In all my projects, I keep a sharp focus on user experience, adopting a user-centered methodology to create intuitive and flawless solutions.

UI_DESIGN.TITLE: UI Design
UI_DESIGN.CONTENT: I'm not a dedicated designer by profession, but I have a solid understanding of design principles. I create clean and functional layouts and wireframes in Figma, and I'm also able to vectorize designs and work with other design tools. While my focus is on building user-friendly interfaces, I bring practical design knowledge to ensure both usability and style.
